name: Handball Action Total
description: A realistic Handball Action game for PC. Experience 3D Handball with realistic game play. Choose between many national and international teams or create your own competition. Take part in all of the world's most important tournaments or make your own tournament.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphic Card with DirectX 9 or OpenGL 2.0 min. 1 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: DSL for Internet Online Mode
